message.body: Happy thanksgiving! Let's skype tomorrow or Saturday after you get back to cal
Happy thanksgiving! And I'm so down to see some snow! ⛄haha
Haha I can finally send you my weird shit!!  電話費تسنسغبغصدעדישיריג
י and snow on saturday sounds like a plan, I'll hit you up then :)
This mom on the Bart Is feeding her two kids seaweed :D
That's so gonna be us someday! How was thanksgiving with johnny's fam? Things are getting weird here my sister is apparently practically suicidal and she
's coming home from London tonight. Last time we called her a cop picked up her phone and told us that he found her alone having a panic attack.
What the fuck? Why what happened?
We don't know. She won't even talk to my mom but she's been sobbing all week and won't say what's wrong. My dad's picking her up from the airport now and
we're having a "family meeting" when she gets here so I guess we'll find out then. I'm worried about her though she's usually the together one!
Meh that sucks. I hope she's okay:/ did she go there for a boy btw?
She went there to see her best friend but there was some guy she met there that she was into this summer that she wanted to see. Nothing happened then bu
t I think she was expecting something this time around. That's probably part of her deal. Hit me up when you're free to skype tomorrow and I'll let you k
now for sure. And I wanna hear about your trip!
Sounds good, I'll be free all say. And I hope she's okay. Ps dining commons closed, kill me
Thanks! And that sucks about the dining commons. Is crossroads closed too? And sounds good, I'll probably be down to skype early afternoon so I'll hit yo
u up around then.
Dude everything is closed. Yay for chipptle!! And sounds good just text me when I should be home in case I find something to do, which is doubtful
Haha I'll do that. And hell yeah I think it's a sign to indulge in a burrito!!! That sounds so good right now
I'm heading there straight from the Bart cuz I'm starving
I plan on doing the same thing on Sunday :)
I'd be a happy girl of you invite me hah :p
Haha consider yourself invited. I'll be there around 2, more details to come soon. Have a good burrito! And watch some desperate housewives tonight :)
Hey! Is 1:15 your time chill for skype?
Dude I'm sorry my sleeping schedule is so fucked. I cannot fall asleep at night so I just woke up:/
Don't even worry about it! I figured you were sleeping when I didn't hear from you. I'll hit you up when I get in tomorrow, should be in the early afternoon
Sounds good. When you said afternoon yesterday I was thinking like four, so it's my bad.
It's all good it's 2 hours later for me here so I wasn't thinking about how early it was for you. I'll see you tomorrow!
Okay sounds good, have a safe flight!
Thanks! Have fun tonight
Hahaha you're funny :p
I try haha. Have a relaxing night in bed with the housewives then. Or Ian Somerhalder :)
Hehe hehe(:
Hey when do you get here again?
Flight just landed! I'll call you when I get to Berkeley if you want to meet up this afternoon
Umm yes. I do. I'm dying here Maddie I need human nteraction. I'm hoping the Bart is super super fast cuz I miss you(:
Ps if ou want you can call when you're at the Bart here and I can walks over or whatever
I miss you too!! And that sounds great, I'll hit you up when I get to the station and you can come over
Sweet(: and we can get fiooooood hah see you soon!
YES! I'm feeling chipotle, or shitty xr food, whatever. SEE YOU SOON! I'm excited
Chipotle, xr not open. Ps I just got up which is whybim typin retardedly. Anywho, see you later!
It's cute haha and I'm jealous you've been sleeping all morning. And yessss chipotle I can taste it already
I'm stoked! (:
Just getting on the Bart now, I should be there in an hr
Sounds good
Maddie what did Tom do in the first season that Lynette doesn't know abou?
The only season 1 thing I can think of is Tom walking in on the babysitter naked! Season 4 gets good with them though
No like he told his dad that he did something after Lynette said she wouldn't forgive him for cheating ever, and he hasn't said anything yet and I'm confused
He has an illegitimate daughter from before they got married so that's probably it. But Lynette doesn't find out until a few seasons later so maybe it's
Oh yeah it prlly is that:p well he sucks
just a weird foreshadowing reference. Let me know if it turns out to be something else!
Yeah and the mother if his child is an annoying bitch so get ready for that
Haha I'm excited
Oh my god Tom is suck a dick!
Such*
Hahaha I like what you just typed, and yes he is
Haha it was a really great typo and in aboutk send you something unny
Yer a wizard Whaley
Haha where did you find that? Great to have an iPhone, huh? :)
Haha on tumblr. And yess the best. Oh my God ahaha johns friend wants to sleep with gabby cuz he's gay
Haha I remember, such a good part of the show! Service sucks in the tunnel as you probably know so I'm most likely getting texts 5 min late
Oh yeah don't even worry, I'm the same in the Bart. Aww zack is so sad and cute:/
And 3 yrs later zack has a thing for gabby, get ready for that one!
Oh Jesus christ come on
Haha I know and her reaction is fucking hilarious
Ps I like how Tom and Lynette switch bed sides like every other episode
What does she do?
He sends her all this creepy secret admirer stuff and she's completely flattered and agrees to meet up with him. She shows up at the restaurant and sees
that it's him and totally flips out, so he offers to pay her to stick around
Oh my god that's hilarious.
Andrew is gay!!!!
Yeah and Bree would have to be his mom, not the best combination
Baha'is and maisy us getting arrested for prostitution! I love this show
I know it's so good! I'm down to watch reruns whenever so let me know the next time you do it, it's been my favorite show for yrs. So funny! Always cheers me up
Bahaha this show is si fucking great! I love that you enlightened me! And I do it every day ahaha
Glad I could be of service haha you did the same for me with vampire diaries. I never really watch it though, I just pause on ian somerhalder's face :)
Haha he is si fucking sexy my god. I wanna jump his bones.
Me toooo I want him at cal. Yae and her alarm can move out and he can come live with me
Haha yes that would be si great! And oh Jesus hat happens with Martha hubers siter who knows that Mary Alice is Angela?
She's sketchy as fuck, she eventually becomes a series regular and she gets her daughter to marry Paul. He has no idea, it's really funny
What the fuck that is so weird!
Ps who is Angela? Confusing
Yeah the show gets weird eventually when they run out of ideas, but it's still worth watching. And the Angela bit is pretty hard to explain but basically
Mary Alice is Angela. She changed her name after she killed Zack's biological mom
Yeah they're the same person but why Utah? And who is Dana?
The Utah thing makes no sense but Dana is Zack's real name
Dana is a girls name...
According to the writers it works for both genders...except it doesn't. Probably trying to throw the viewers off
Yeah definitely, kind of dumb haha. Aww Susan and mike:/
I know they're adorable! And I'm 2 stops away :)
Oh yay. I'll come at like four? That chill?
Haga Susan is drunk and spilling all of Pauls secrets and she thinks he killed Martha :p
Yeah that's perfect! I'll see you then. And I hope you're hungry because I'm starving. Haha Susan, always such a dumbass, but I love her
She is so my favorite. And I am starving dude no food all day. And everyone knows Rex slept with maisy see sad
Yeah Rex is an ass but George is actually a psychopath. Has he showed up yet?
Dude yes and he's poisoning Rex!!!
Baha'is Lynette in the bouncy house with the other mom
